p.d: Paul has disappeared. Run away? Kidnapped? Justine's body has been found: killed by a violent blow to the back of her head. What did she know? Sarah receives a call from the kidnappers: Paul has indeed been taken hostage; she'll get him back if she drops her investigation and returns to Paris. It is becoming increasingly obvious that all the recent events, including Alex's death, are linked to the fire that decimated the Paoli family... Directed by: Christophe Lamotte (France, 2018) Screenplay: Clothilde Jamin, Clélia Constantine Cast: Claire Keim (Sarah), Marie Bunel (Hélene Aguze), Samuel Jouy (Yann Kasik), Yann Trégouët (Matthieu Aguze), Anne Caillon (Nadine), Bastien Bouillon (Louis Aguze), Géraldine Martineau (Justine), Camille Aguilar (Lili Aguze), Gaspard Pasquet (Paul Aguze), Cyril Garnier (Alex Aguze), Lucienne Deschamps (Léonie), Loqman Menas (Jamel), Hocine Choutri (Xavier Dugeais) Genre: drama
